trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty class represents a schema property definition that is contained in the schema partition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object that was created to the Active Directory Domain Services.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
context does not refer to a valid or , or ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
context or ldapDisplayName is .
Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.String> that gets or sets the CN of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.String> that gets or sets a description of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the managed resources should be released; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
A <xref:System.String> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema property to search for.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object for the schema property that is found.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property is not found.
The object was not found.
context does not refer to a valid or , or ldapDisplayName parameter is an empty string.
context or ldapDisplayName is .
Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the directory entry for the schema property.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object is not a valid instance.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object is defunct.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the current schema property object is defunct.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the ANR set.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property is in the ANR set.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it is in the ANR set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the current schema property is indexed in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is indexed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property is indexed in all containers.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the global catalog.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it is contained in the global catalog; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is in the tombstone object that contains deleted properties.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property is contained in the tombstone object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it is contained in the tombstone object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the schema property is single-valued.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property is single valued.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it is single-valued; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether there is a tuple index for this schema property.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the schema property has a tuple index.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is a tuple index for the property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> that links to the current schema property.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object that is linked to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets the value for the link identifier when the schema property is linked.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the linkID value when the schema property is linked.

For more information, see the topic [Link-ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_linkid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
A <xref:System.String> value that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets the OID of the schema property.
A <xref:System.String> value that contains the OID of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum value or length that the schema property can have.
An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the minimum value or length of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object value.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
There is no lower range for this property.
Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum value or length that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object can have.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that indicates the maximum value or length of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object value.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
There is no upper range for this property.
Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object of the same name already exists.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets the schemaIDGuid for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the schemaIDGuid for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Gets or sets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> object indicating the property type (syntax) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> object that defines the property type of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The specified type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> value (applies to set only).
Gets the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
